summary: Hearthfire required. Allows you to craft unbranded beverages via a cookpot.
descriptionHtml:
HEARTHFIRE REQUIRED. This mod adds the following items. The amount of the item crafted will be in brackets, and the items required to make the item will be in parenthesis.

[1] Bottle of Water (no items are required to make water)

This mod adds the following recipes for existing items. The amount of the item crafted will be in brackets, and the items required to make the item will be in parenthesis.

[1] Ale (1x Water, 1x Wheat)
[1] Wine (2x Water, 5x Jazbay Grape)
[1] Alto Wine (2x Water, 2x Juniper Berry, 3x Jazbay Grape)
[1] Mead (1x Water, 1x Honey)
[1] Mead With Juniper Berry (1x Water, 1x Honey, 3x Juniper Berry)

All of the above beverages are craftable via a cookpot. If you're having trouble obtaining the honey required to craft mead, you can take a look at this mod's sister, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49007/?]More Craftable Food Items[/url].
author: Fs97
